value.name: Fire Department graduates its 34th Recruit Class
value.description: Marlon Lewis received the Most Outstanding award at the graduation ceremony last month for the Maui Fire Department’s 34th Recruit Class. Twenty-three firefighters, including two who will work ...

value.name: Family sues over death after deputies repeatedly used Tasers
value.description: The Charlotte Observer reports that the family of Marlon Lewis alleges in a lawsuit filed this month that two Tasers were fired 26 times in the encounter, amounting to excessive force. The suit ...
